synopsis.text:
Cup aspirations. His stepfather, a coach for the national team, presents an unexpected opportunity. Determined to showcase his minor league-honed skills, Goro seizes the chance to become a practice pitcher for the Japanese team, aiming to impress the manager with his speed and prowess.

As the world's strongest baseball players prepare to gather for the prestigious World Cup, Goro's lifelong dream of becoming a professional baseball player, just like his father, is within reach. His unwavering passion for the game has always been an inspiration to those around him, and now it's time to put that passion to the test on the global stage.

Back in Japan after the end of the baseball season, Goro is greeted by familiar faces, new rivals, and the chance of a lifetime. Learning about the selection process for the Japan Representatives, a team comprising the best players from the country, Goro is eager to secure a spot. The stakes are even higher as he discovers that his longtime rival, Joe Gibson, will be playing for the American team. This could be Goro's ultimate opportunity to not only represent his country but also face off against Gibson in a long-awaited showdown.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
